^(application_id)$.description: The application ID of the application registration within the referenced AAD tenant.

^(client_secret)$.description: The client secret generated for the above app ID in AAD.

^(directory_id)$.description: The directory ID corresponding to the Azure Active Directory (AAD) tenant of the application.

^(federated_token_file)$.description: Specifically useful for workload identity federation.
^(federated_token_file)$.title: Location of the file containing a federated token.
